text: Every Time We Say Goodbye is a 1986 American Israeli drama movie directed by Moshé Mizrahi and starring Tom Hanks, Cristina Marsillach, Benedict Taylor, Anat Atzmon, Gila Almagor, Alon Aboutboul. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies directed by Moshé Mizrahi Category:Movies set in Israel
title: Every Time We Say Goodbye (movie)
